query.name: get_all_entry_amounts
query.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT &pb_entry_amounts;.entry_id, &pb_entry_amounts;.account_id, &pb_entry_amounts;.entry_amount_id, &pb_entry_amounts;.entry_amount, &pb_entry_amounts;.entry_type_id, &pb_accounts;.name, &pb_accounts;.account_type_id, CONCAT_WS(':',CASE &pb_accounts;.account_type_id WHEN 10000 THEN 'Assets' WHEN 20000 THEN 'Liabilities' WHEN 30000 THEN 'Equity' WHEN 40000 THEN 'Income' ELSE 'Expenses' END, &pb_accounts;.name) as account_full_name, &pb_general_ledger;.account_id as posted_account_id
FROM &pb_accounts;, &pb_entry_amounts;
LEFT JOIN &pb_general_ledger; ON &pb_general_ledger;.entry_amount_id=&pb_entry_amounts;.entry_amount_id
WHERE &pb_accounts;.id = &pb_entry_amounts;.account_id
ORDER BY &pb_entry_amounts;.entry_type_id DESC
